name: Sue Stephens
text: Gexpro has a convenient location to me. They had the part I needed in stock. They provided excellent customer service! Thanks, Gexpro! You will be my go-to from here on for electrical supplies.

resp.text: Sue, we are so pleased to hear about your positive experience at our branch! Thank you for the feedback and for the 5-star review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Andrew Ohlinger
text: Great electrical and lighting supply. Very helpful counter staff. They also have a great stock of Klein and Southwire tools!

resp.text: Andrew, thanks so much for the 5-star review! We really appreciate you taking the time to write a review and your continued business.

name: Paul Goodridge
text: Great place to work and great boss to work with.  Friendly staff and great services.

resp.text: Thanks, Paul, for reviewing the branch. We appreciate it!

We apologize you had a negative experience with us with ordering. We strive to serve our customers at the highest level and hope we can connect with you to see how we can do better. Please reach out to our branch manager at (256) 774-1651 so we can correct the problem.

name: Mickey Ergle
text: Gerald came out the day I called. My outside box was damaged by hurricane Sally. He go me going safely that night. Then the next day installed us a new main box. It was even cheaper than I could have asked for. His professional and personal attitude was well above great. These are the folks to call.

name: Snapple K
text: Very knowledgeable engineers. I was amazed at the resolution they came up with. It worked and I am very satisfied! If I should ever need electrical work again I will absolutely call them first.

name: Jim Meyer
text: Needed to correct the mis_application of a remodeling project. Electric Power was on the job within an hour and done within two. Thoroughly professional and knowledgeable. They will be on our recommended list.

name: Electric Power
text: Arrived on time - did the work professionally - respected our property - priced right! Couldn't ask for anything more. Re-hire without hesitation!

name: Sam Donaldson
text: Very professional, quick response, even advised on a few things we were doing ourselves. Assisted after the work was done, and much more affordable than Lowe s on lighting install.
